testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin), I want to be able to access the detailed information of the ticket with the specified id number via the API connection.
testcase.name: admin Validate that when a GET request is sent to the api/ticket/{id} endpoint with valid authorization
testcase.system-out: * The api user sets "api/ticket/4" path parameters..........................passed * The api user sends a "GET" request and saves the returned response........passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user verifies that the data in the response body includes 4, 33, 3, "delivery", "high", "Missing Items in Shipment", "complaint from our customer", "2023-09-04", 0, "2023-09-04T14:36:06.000000Z" and "2024-09-17T12:29:12.000000Z"..passed
